Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
stars.controller.AdminController
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class AdminController
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserControllerInterface
Controller to manage the admin user

      Creates new Index object
      Parameters:

      newVacancy - Vacancy of the new index to be created
      newIndexNumber - Index number of the new index to be created

    • createCourse

      Creates a new Course Object
      Parameters:
      newCourseID - the course ID of the course to be created
      newAU - Number of AU of the new course
      newSchool - School that is teaching the course
      newCourseName - course name
      Returns:
      Course object that was created

    • addTiming

      public boolean addTiming​(Index newIndex, Timing newTiming)
      add a Timing object to an Index object
      Parameters:
      newIndex - index which Timing object will be added to
      newTiming - Timing which will be added to Index Object
      Returns:
      true if there is no overlap with exisiting timing object in the Index, the timing would be successfully added. false if there is an overlap with exisiting timing object in Index. Timing will not be added

    • addStudent

      public boolean addStudent​(java.lang.String studentName, java.lang.String nationality, java.lang.String gender, java.lang.String studentID, java.lang.String degree, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password, java.time.LocalDateTime start, java.time.LocalDateTime end)
      Creates and adds a new Student object to the database
      Parameters:
      studentName - Name of student to be added
      nationality - nationality of student to be added
      gender - gender of student to be added
      studentID - ID of student to be added, will be the username for login
      degree - degree of student to be added
      email - email of student to be added
      password - password of student to be added
      start - access period start of student to be added
      end - access period end of student to be added
      Returns:
      true if new Student is added successfully, false if student already exists in the database

    • addCourse

      public boolean addCourse​(Course newCourse)
      Add a Course Object to the database
      Parameters:
      newCourse - Course to be added to the database
      Returns:
      true if new Course is added successfully, false if course already exist in the database

    • setCourseID

      public boolean setCourseID​(Course selectedCourse, java.lang.String newCourseID)
      Set the courseid of the selected course with the new id
      Parameters:
      selectedCourse - Course whose courseid will be changed
      newCourseID - New courseid
      Returns:
      true of changed successfully, false if new courseid already exists in the database

    • setVacancyLimit

      public boolean setVacancyLimit​(Index selectedIndex, int newVacancyLimit)
      Set the vacancy limit to an index Can increase the vacancy limit of the index, which will dequeue waitlisted students and confirm their positions and send notifications Can decrease the vacancy limit as long the number of confirmed students is still within the limit Cannot decrease the vacancy limit if the new vacancy limit is less than the number of confirmed students in the index
      Parameters:
      selectedIndex - Index whose vacancy will be changed
      newVacancyLimit - new vacancy limit
      Returns:
      true if successfully changed, false if new vacancy limit is less the the number of confirmed students in the index

    • addIndex

      public boolean addIndex​(Course selectedCourse, Index newIndex)
      Add an Index object to a Course object
      Parameters:
      selectedCourse - Course which will add a new Index
      newIndex - Index object to be added to the course
      Returns:
      true if added successfully, false if index number already exists in the course

    • changeIndexID

      public boolean changeIndexID​(Index selectedIndex, int newIndexID)
      Set the IndexID of an Index to a new value
      Parameters:
      selectedIndex - Index object whose IndexID will be changed
      newIndexID - new Index ID
      Returns:
      true if added successfully, false if index new index number already exists in the course

    • dropIndex

      public boolean dropIndex​(Course selectedCourse, Index selectedIndex)
      Drop index from course
      Parameters:
      selectedCourse - Course whose index will be dropped
      selectedIndex - Index to be dropped from the course
      Returns:
      true if index is empty and can be dropped, false if index has confirmed students, index will not be dropped

    • editAccess

      public void editAccess​(java.lang.String studentID, java.time.LocalDateTime start, java.time.LocalDateTime end)
      edit access of a student
      Parameters:
      studentID - studentid and username of the user
      start - new start of access period of student
      end - new end of access period of student
